abstract: The app intent conforms to the schema for visual search functionality.
overview:
## Overview

To integrate your app’s functionality with Visual Intelligence you use Swift macros that generate additional properties and add protocol conformance for your app intent implementation.

For more information about the `.visualIntelligence` app intent domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Making-in-app-search-actions-available-to-siri-and-apple-intelligence]. For general information about app intent domains, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Integrating-actions-with-siri-and-apple-intelligence].

The following example shows an app intent that conforms to the `.visualIntelligence.semanticContentSearch` schema:
title: semanticContentSearch
